title: hello I started to have a problem with hotspot at my pixel 3a xl when I put my phone its turning off
content: started to have a problem with hotspot when I put my phone in my pocket hotspot turning off actually it's on but the other device which I use as a connection is losing that wifi which I create from Pixel 3a xl. I don't have auto off hotspot when no devices are connected
